trans-unit.target: Firefox အက်ပ်ကို ရယူပါ
trans-unit.note: Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.

Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll
trans-unit.target: ဓါတ်ပုံများကို Camera Roll ထဲတွင် သိမ်းဆည်းနိုင်စေသည်
trans-unit.note: Description for dialog used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos.

trans-unit.target: အပြင်အဆင်များကို ဖွင့်ပါ
trans-unit.note: Title for button that takes the user to system settings

trans-unit.source: “%@” Would Like to Access Your Photos
trans-unit.target: “%@” သည် သင့်ဓါတ်ပုံများကို အသုံးပြုခွင့် ရလိုသည်
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text displayed as an example of the template to add a search engine.
Text for a share button
Text used when the user shares their trackers blocked stats

trans-unit.source: %1$@, the privacy browser from Mozilla, has already blocked %2$@ trackers for me. Fewer ads and trackers following me around means faster browsing! Get Focus for yourself here
trans-unit.note: First %@ is the app name. Second %@ is the number of trackers that have been blocked. This is the text shared to others (on social media or otherwise) after the user chooses to share their tracker stats
Label for ad trackers.

trans-unit.target: သရုပ်ခွဲခြေရာခံကိရိယာများ
trans-unit.note: label for analytic trackers.

trans-unit.target: အကြောင်းအရာ ခြေရာခံကိရိယာများ
trans-unit.note: label for content trackers.

trans-unit.target: ခြေရာခံကာကွယ်မှုကို ပိတ်ထားသည်
trans-unit.note: text showing the tracking protection is disabled.
Text for the button to learn more about Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.target: လူမှုဆိုင်ရာ ခြေရာခံကိရိယာများ
trans-unit.note: label for social trackers.

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.
trans-unit.target: %@ ကို မပိတ်သေးသ၍ သို့မဟုတ် ERASE ကို မနှိပ်သေးသ၍ လုပ်ဆောင်ချက်ကို ပိတ်ထားပါ။
trans-unit.note: Description for the tracking protection toggle. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar

trans-unit.target: ခြေရာခံ ကာကွယ်မှု
trans-unit.note: Text for the toggle that temporarily disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether %@ blocks ad, analytic, social, and other trackers.
trans-unit.target: %@ သည် မည်သည့် ကြော်ငြာ၊ သရုပ်ခွဲ၊ လူမှုဆိုင်ရာနှင့် အခြားသော နောက်ယောင်ခံ ကိရိယာများကို ပိတ်ရမည်ဆိုတာ ရွေးချယ်ပါ။
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
